question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. white digital billboard
B. bicycle
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The white digital billboard and the bicycle are both in the midground, and their relative depth is ambiguous in the 2D image without a depth map or clear occlusion cues to determine which is closer.
